title: Dubai City Explorer - 4 Days
description: Discover the modern marvels and traditional charm of Dubai in this comprehensive 4-day city tour. Experience iconic landmarks, luxury shopping, and authentic Emirati culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Modern Dubai
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, Burj Khalifa visit, Dubai Mall exploration

itinerary.title: Traditional Dubai
itinerary.description: Dubai Creek, Gold Souk, Spice Souk, Al Fahidi Historical District

itinerary.title: Dubai Marina & Beaches
itinerary.description: Dubai Marina walk, JBR Beach, Marina cruise, Palm Jumeirah visit

title: Dubai Desert Adventure - 3 Days
description: Experience the thrill of the Arabian Desert with dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional Bedouin camp experiences. Perfect for adventure seekers.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari & Camp
itinerary.description: Pickup from Dubai, dune bashing, camel ride, desert camp setup, BBQ dinner

itinerary.title: Desert Activities
itinerary.description: Sunrise photography, sandboarding, falconry show, traditional breakfast

itinerary.title: Return to Dubai
itinerary.description: Morning desert walk, return to Dubai, city drop-off

title: Dubai Luxury Experience - 5 Days
description: Indulge in the ultimate Dubai luxury experience with 5-star accommodations, private tours, fine dining, and exclusive access to premium attractions.

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival
itinerary.description: VIP airport pickup, 5-star hotel check-in, welcome dinner at Burj Al Arab

itinerary.title: Sky High Dubai
itinerary.description: Private helicopter tour, Burj Khalifa VIP experience, luxury shopping

itinerary.title: Atlantis Experience
itinerary.description: Atlantis Resort day pass, aquarium visit, water park access, spa treatment

itinerary.title: Private Yacht & Desert
itinerary.description: Private yacht charter, luxury desert safari with private camp
